trans-unit.source: The class used for serializing and deserializing security tokens, security key identifiers, and security key identifier clauses defined in the WS-Security, WS-Trust, and WS-SecureConversation security specifications.
The following code demonstrates a custom override of this class.
trans-unit.target: В следующем коде показано переопределение этого класса.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
When <see langword="true" />, this includes <see langword="ValueType" /> and <see langword="EncodingType" /> attributes where applicable during security token serialization.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The security version.

The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The security version.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
The extensibility point used for serializing and deserializing SAML tokens.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The security version.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
The extensibility point used for serializing and deserializing SAML tokens.
The encoder used for encoding and decoding security state that is attached as a cookie to security context tokens.
A collection of types.
These known types must be declared to include custom claims as part of the security context token's cookie.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The <paramref name="securityVersion" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The security version.
The set of supported versions of the WS-Trust specification.
The set of supported versions of the WS-SecureConversation specification.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
The extensibility point used for serializing and deserializing SAML tokens.
The encoder used for encoding and decoding security state that is attached as a cookie to security context tokens.
A collection of known types.
These known types must be declared to include custom claims as part of the security context token's cookie.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The security version.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
The extensibility point used for serializing and deserializing SAML tokens.
The encoder used for encoding and decoding security state that is attached as a cookie to security context tokens.
A collection of known types.
These known types must be declared to include custom claims as part of the security context token's cookie.
The maximum key derivation offset.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
The maximum key derivation label length.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
The maximum key derivation nonce length.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The <paramref name="securityVersion" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <paramref name="maximumKeyDerivationOffset" /> is less than 0, <paramref name="maximumKeyDerivationLabelLength" /> is less than 0, or <paramref name="maximumKeyDerivationNonceLength" /> is less than or equal to 0.
The security version.
The set of supported versions of the WS-Trust specification.
The set of supported versions of the WS-SecureConversation specification.
The value to use for the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer.EmitBspRequiredAttributes" /> property.
The extensibility point used for serializing and deserializing SAML tokens.
The encoder used for encoding and decoding security state that is attached as a cookie to security context tokens.
A collection of known types.
These known types must be declared to include custom claims as part of the security context token's cookie.
The maximum key derivation offset.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
The maximum key derivation label length.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
The maximum key derivation nonce length.
This setting places a bound on the amount of processing the server does when deserializing Derived Key Tokens.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.WSSecurityTokenSerializer" /> class.
The XmlReader.
Gets a value that indicates whether the key identifier clause core can be read using the specified reader.
<see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause core can be read using the specified reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The XmlReader.
Gets a value that indicates whether the key identifier core can be read using the specified reader.
<see langword="true" /> if the key identifier core can be read using the specified reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The XmlReader.
Gets a value that indicates whether the token core can be read using the specified reader.
<see langword="true" /> if the token core can be read using the specified reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The security key identifier clause.
Gets a value that indicates whether the key identifier clause core with a specified key identifier clause can be written.
<see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause core with the specified key identifier clause can be written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The security key identifier.
Gets a value that indicates whether the key identifier core with a specified key identifier clause can be written.
<see langword="true" /> if the key identifier core with the specified key identifier clause can be written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The security token.
Gets a value that indicates whether the token core with a specified security token can be written.
<see langword="true" /> if the token core with the specified security token can be written; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The security token.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle" />.
Creates a key identifier clause from a token expressed as XML.
The created security key identifier.
An error occurred when deserializing the key identifier clause or the key identifier clause could not be read.
Gets a default instance of this class.
A default instance of this class.
Gets a value that indicates whether to emit BSP required attributes.
<see langword="true" /> if BSP required attributes are to be emitted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="true" />, если требуется создать необходимые атрибуты BSP; в противном случае — значение <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the security token.
Gets the URI of the security token of the specified type.
The URI of the security token of the specified type.
Gets the maximum key derivation label length.
The maximum key derivation label length.
Gets the maximum key derivation nonce length.
The maximum key derivation nonce length.
trans-unit.target: Максимальная длина однократно используемого числа (nonce) для производного ключа.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum key derivation offset.
The maximum key derivation offset.
The specified XmlReader.
Reads the key identifier clause core using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
The security key identifier clause that was read.
An error occurred when deserializing the key identifier clause or the key identifier clause could not be read.
The specified XmlReader.
Reads the key identifier core using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
The security key identifier that was read.
An error occurred when deserializing the key identifier or the key identifier could not be read.
The specified XmlReader.
The security token resolver.
Reads the token core using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
The security token that was read.
An error occurred when deserializing the token or the token could not be read.
Gets the security version.
The security version.
The security token.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenReferenceStyle" />.
A sub-unit of an element that contains a security key identifier token.
Attempts to create a key identifier clause from a token expressed as XML.
<see langword="true" /> if the key identifier clause was created; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The specified XmlWriter.
The security key identifier clause.
Writes the key identifier clause core with a specified key identifier clause using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
An error occurred when serializing the key identifier clause.
The key identifier clause was not successfully written.
The specified XmlWriter.
The security key identifier clause.
Writes the key identifier core with a specified key identifier clause using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
An error occurred when serializing the key identifier.
The key identifier was not successfully written.
The specified XmlWriter.
The security token.
Writes the token core with a specified security token using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
An error occurred when serializing the security token.
The token was not successfully written.
